text: The 1981 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament was played in Wichita, Kansas after the conclusion of the 1980–1981 regular season. The won their 2nd MVC Tournament title to earn an automatic bid to the 1981 NCAA Tournament. ==Bracket== ==References== Category:1980–81 Missouri Valley Conference men's basketball season Category:Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1981 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
